author: Birdy_Stone
text: I think we can win against France, they are of course world champions but they have weaknesses in their back, with N’Golo Kanté and Pogba missing, it’s a good time to beat them.

author: ShitPostQuokkaRome
text: Yeah half of France's best few players are chopped up at home (Benzema, Kante, Pogba)

author: Zigzagnemesis
text: That’s 3 players. England are also missing Reece James. This will be an easy win for France, I am predicting minimum 3-1. Brazil vs France final is almost guaranteed at this point.

author: patiperro_v3
text: It’s as good a chance they are gonna get. I think England will do it… get on a high, and then lose to Portugal.

author: Zigzagnemesis
text: Please do not tell me you actually believe what you wrote?! This is a demolition job for France, this is probably the most one sided tie in the quarter finals, France 3-1 England minimum, can easily see it being a higher scoreline. England have one of the worst defences in the tournament, a very average midfield, and also one of the worst managers in the tournament. France are missing key players, that’s true. But it really doesn’t matter one bit, they have enough quality in the squad to send England to the cleaners.
